section.para: The ngx_http_autoindex_module module produces a directory listing. Usually a request is passed to the ngx_http_autoindex_module module when the ngx_http_index_module module could not find an index file.

directive.name: autoindex
directive.para: Enables or disables a directory listing output.

directive.name: autoindex_exact_size
directive.para: Specifies whether file sizes in the directory listing should be output exactly, or rounded to kilobytes, megabytes, and gigabytes.

directive.name: autoindex_localtime
directive.para: Specifies whether times in the directory listing should be output in a local time zone or UTC.
